nodes.text: "The Final Battle" is a minor theatrical theme used in Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope to represent the Battle of Yavin. It was written by John Williams and performed by the London Symphony Orchestra in 1977. It includes the Imperial motif, "Princess Leia's Theme," "Rebel Fanfare," "The Force Theme," Luke Skywalker's theme, and the Death Star motif, in addition to its own motivic material.
